name: Arcade Wars
description:
Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to shoot
  • B to bomb (clears enemy bullets for five seconds)
Gameplay

Survive onslaughts of arcade machine enemies! The coins on the right side of your screen show your current health, as well as ammunition. Collect dropped coins from destroyed enemies into your funnels. You can also collect bullets into the funnels, but be careful – bullets hitting your chassis (the green box) will hurt you!

Story

In an arcade far, far away...

It is a dark time for the arcades. Although the regulars still play every day, newcomers are unheard of. The arcade machines, whose lifeforce comes from the coins, now have to compete with each other.

So, in the middle of the deepest nights ... the war has changed.
